card.name: Abundant Maw
card.property: Emerge {6}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Decimator of the Provinces
card.property: Emerge {6}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn. Trample, haste

card.name: Distended Mindbender
card.property: Emerge {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose from it a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less and a card with converted mana cost 4 or greater. That player discards those cards.

card.name: Drownyard Behemoth
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Emerge {7}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) Drownyard Behemoth has hexproof as long as it entered the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Elder Deep-Fiend
card.property: Flash Emerge {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, tap up to four target permanents.

card.name: Emrakul, the Promised End
card.property: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card type among cards in your graveyard. When you cast this spell, you gain control of target opponent during that player's next turn. After that turn, that player takes an extra turn. Flying, trample, protection from instants

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An enigma as vexing as life itself.

card.name: Eternal Scourge
card.property: You may cast Eternal Scourge from exile. When Eternal Scourge becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, exile Eternal Scourge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has latched onto this place like an infestation. All efforts at eradication have proved futile." —Yeter, Trostad villager

card.name: It of the Horrid Swarm
card.property: Emerge {6}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

card.name: Lashweed Lurker
card.property: Emerge {5}{G}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, you may put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Mockery of Nature
card.property: Emerge {7}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Vexing Scuttler
card.property: Emerge {6}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wretched Gryff
card.property: Emerge {5}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's converted mana cost.) When you cast this spell, draw a card. Flying

card.name: Blessed Alliance
card.property: Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more — • Target player gains 4 life. • Untap up to two target creatures. • Target opponent sacrifices an attacking creature.

card.name: Borrowed Grace
card.property: Escalate {1}{W} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or both — • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Bruna, the Fading Light
card.property: When you cast this spell, you may return target Angel or Human creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flying, vigilance (Melds with Gisela, the Broken Blade.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She now sees only Emrakul's visions.

alternate.name: Brisela, Voice of Nightmares
alternate.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink Your opponents can't cast spells with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Upon discovering what had become of her sisters, Sigarda could only weep.

card.name: Choking Restraints
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. {3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Choking Restraints: Exile enchanted creature.

card.name: Collective Effort
card.property: Escalate—Tap an untapped creature you control. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more — • Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. • Destroy target enchantment. • Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.

card.name: Courageous Outrider
card.property: When Courageous Outrider enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One silvery blast signaled that she wouldn't be arriving at Thraben alone.

card.name: Dawn Gryff
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After facing so many horrors, the survivors of Videns parish couldn't comprehend the hope that the gryff represented.

card.name: Deploy the Gatewatch
card.property: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put up to two planeswalker cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gideon and Liliana may not have seen eye to eye, but that did not stop them from fighting side by side.

card.name: Desperate Sentry
card.property: When Desperate Sentry dies, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token. Delirium — Desperate Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Drogskol Shieldmate
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Drogskol Shieldmate enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will join you so that you will not yet join me."

card.name: Extricator of Sin
card.property: When Extricator of Sin enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token. Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, transform Extricator of Sin.

alternate.name: Extricator of Flesh
alternate.property: Eldrazi you control have vigilance. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a non-Eldrazi creature: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

card.name: Faith Unbroken
card.property: Enchant creature you control When Faith Unbroken enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Faithbearer Paladin
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen cathars riding to battle without a hint of fear. Perhaps that is its own sort of madness." —Esler, Havengul mercenary

card.name: Fiend Binder
card.property: Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.

card.name: Geist of the Lonely Vigil
card.property: Defender, flying Delirium — Geist of the Lonely Vigil can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flicker of candlelight and the echo of hymns told the villagers that the monastery wasn't truly abandoned.

card.name: Gisela, the Broken Blade
card.property: Flying, first strike, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, if you both own and control Gisela, the Broken Blade and a creature named Bruna, the Fading Light, exile them, then meld them into Brisela, Voice of Nightmares.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She now hears only Emrakul's murmurs.

alternate.name: Brisela, Voice of Nightmares
alternate.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink Your opponents can't cast spells with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Upon discovering what had become of her sisters, Sigarda could only weep.

card.name: Give No Ground
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+6 until end of turn and can block any number of creatures this turn.

card.name: Guardian of Pilgrims
card.property: When Guardian of Pilgrims enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Immune to the physical warping caused by Emrakul, geists proved to be some of humanity's most important allies.

card.name: Ironclad Slayer
card.property: When Ironclad Slayer enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best weapon is the one at hand.

card.name: Ironwright's Cleansing
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Lone Rider
card.property: First strike, lifelink At the beginning of the end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, transform Lone Rider.

alternate.name: It That Rides as One
alternate.property: First strike, trample, lifelink

card.name: Long Road Home
card.property: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The person who finishes a journey is rarely the same as the one who starts it.

card.name: Lunarch Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}, Sacrifice a permanent: This creature gains flying until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A boon from the angels should never be cast aside." —Manfried Ulmach, Chief Inquisitor

card.name: Peace of Mind
card.property: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all minds touched by the Eldrazi turn to raging psychosis. Some simply withdraw from this world into memories of a better one.

card.name: Providence
card.property: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, your life total becomes 26. Your life total becomes 26.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is power in prayer, regardless of who is listening.

card.name: Repel the Abominable
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Human sources.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fight for a better future, even if you may not live to see it." —Grete, Order of Saint Traft

card.name: Sanctifier of Souls
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Sanctifier of Souls gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {2}{W}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Selfless Spirit
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Selfless Spirit: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Sigarda's Aid
card.property: You may cast Aura and Equipment spells as though they had flash. Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach it to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Order of Saint Traft found new strength with Sigarda's support.

card.name: Sigardian Priest
card.property: {1}, {T}: Tap target non-Human creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many whose faith was destroyed by Avacyn turned to the only angel who remained true to humanity.

card.name: Spectral Reserves
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My predecessors taught me of duty and commitment. It seems they have more to teach." —Wendin, veteran cathar

card.name: Steadfast Cathar
card.property: Whenever Steadfast Cathar attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most resolute soldiers will press forward in the face of overwhelming odds." —Gideon Jura

card.name: Subjugator Angel
card.property: Flying When Subjugator Angel enters the battlefield, tap all creatures your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The remnants of Innistrad's corrupted angelic hosts collapsed to form the Flight of Nightmares.

card.name: Thalia, Heretic Cathar
card.property: First strike Creatures and nonbasic lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Salvation will not be granted by the Lunarch Council. It must be earned—at the edge of a sword, if necessary."

card.name: Thalia's Lancers
card.property: First strike When Thalia's Lancers enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a legendary card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the points of our lances lead the way."

card.name: Thraben Standard Bearer
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The uncorrupted rallied under Thalia's leadership and Sigarda's banner.

card.name: Advanced Stitchwing
card.property: Flying {2}{U}, Discard two cards: Return Advanced Stitchwing from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Improvement is a consequence of practice." —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Chilling Grasp
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step. Madness {3}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Coax from the Blind Eternities
card.property: You may choose an Eldrazi card you own from outside the game or in exile, reveal that card, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At Nahiri's call, Emrakul traversed the vast emptiness between the planes and arrived on Innistrad.

card.name: Contingency Plan
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Improvisation is for those who failed to prepare." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Convolute
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no sense arguing with insanity." —Levana, Midnight Duelist

card.name: Curious Homunculus
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are three or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, transform Curious Homunculus.

alternate.name: Voracious Reader
alternate.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Displace
card.property: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll see you soon, Subjects 25 and 26. I've got a good feeling this time!"

card.name: Docent of Perfection
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature token. Then if you control three or more Wizards, transform Docent of Perfection.

alternate.name: Final Iteration
alternate.property: Flying Wizards you control get +2/+1 and have flying. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature token.

card.name: Drag Under
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some took to their boats to escape the unfolding nightmare. The remains of their vessels now litter the shores of Nephalia.

card.name: Enlightened Maniac
card.property: When Enlightened Maniac enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At last! Proof that it's not all in my head!"

card.name: Exultant Cultist
card.property: When Exultant Cultist dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amid the gibbering chorus that rose from the drownyard temple, Jace recognized a single word: "Emrakul."

card.name: Fogwalker
card.property: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) When Fogwalker enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Fortune's Favor
card.property: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Geist of the Archives
card.property: Defender At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After reading the final words, it turns back to the first page and begins again.

card.name: Grizzled Angler
card.property: {T}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Then if there is a colorless creature card in your graveyard, transform Grizzled Angler.

alternate.name: Grisly Anglerfish
alternate.property: {6}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

card.name: Identity Thief
card.property: Whenever Identity Thief attacks, you may exile another target nontoken creature. If you do, Identity Thief becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Imprisoned in the Moon
card.property: Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.

card.name: Ingenious Skaab
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {U}: Ingenious Skaab gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heads and shoulders above the rest.

card.name: Laboratory Brute
card.property: When Laboratory Brute enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It keeps intruders out and experiments in.

card.name: Lunar Force
card.property: When an opponent casts a spell, sacrifice Lunar Force and counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Moonlight offers sublime warmth that brings me a comfort sunlight cannot provide."

card.name: Mausoleum Wanderer
card.property: Flying Whenever another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, Mausoleum Wanderer gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice Mausoleum Wanderer: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is Mausoleum Wanderer's power.

card.name: Mind's Dilation
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, that player exiles the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infinite wisdom cannot be contained within a single mind.

card.name: Nebelgast Herald
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying Whenever Nebelgast Herald or another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Niblis of Frost
card.property: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Scour the Laboratory
card.property: Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. Draw three cards.

card.name: Spontaneous Mutation
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Summary Dismissal
card.property: Exile all other spells and counter all abilities.

card.name: Take Inventory
card.property: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Take Inventory in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A place for everything, and everything in its place.

card.name: Tattered Haunter
card.property: Flying Tattered Haunter can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Nebelgast recedes, there are often stragglers.

card.name: Turn Aside
card.property: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are tides beyond those in the sea that are driven by Innistrad's silver moon. If you learn their patterns, you can channel them in fascinating ways." —Tamiyo

card.name: Unsubstantiate
card.property: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Wharf Infiltrator
card.property: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) Whenever Wharf Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Whenever you discard a creature card, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

card.name: Boon of Emrakul
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All around Emrakul, life re-formed in her image.

card.name: Borrowed Malevolence
card.property: Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or both — • Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Cemetery Recruitment
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's a smoothness to my magic here that I don't find on any other plane."

card.name: Certain Death
card.property: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.

card.name: Collective Brutality
card.property: Escalate—Discard a card. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more — • Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it. That player discards that card. • Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. • Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Cryptbreaker
Dark Salvation
card.property: Target player creates X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, then up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Zombie that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Countless ghouls surged through Thraben's streets, and with them came the city's salvation.

card.name: Dusk Feaster
card.property: Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Voldaren lands remained well protected when Olivia's army marched from Lurenbraum Fortress.

card.name: Gavony Unhallowed
card.property: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Gavony Unhallowed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there." —Grete, Order of Saint Traft

card.name: Graf Harvest
card.property: Zombies you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) {3}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Graf Rats
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you both own and control Graf Rats and a creature named Midnight Scavengers, exile them, then meld them into Chittering Host.

alternate.name: Chittering Host
alternate.property: Haste Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) When Chittering Host enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Haunted Dead
card.property: When Haunted Dead enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. {1}{B}, Discard two cards: Return Haunted Dead from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Liliana, the Last Hope
card.property: +1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-1 until your next turn. −2: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. −7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is two plus the number of Zombies you control."

card.name: Liliana's Elite
card.property: Liliana's Elite gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have to admit, Gideon—he has great form." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Markov Crusader
card.property: Lifelink Markov Crusader has haste as long as you control another Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The surviving members of the Markov bloodline drove through a crush of horrors to reclaim their ancestral home.

card.name: Midnight Scavengers
card.property: When Midnight Scavengers enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. (Melds with Graf Rats.)

alternate.name: Chittering Host
alternate.property: Haste Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) When Chittering Host enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Murder
card.property: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not work if you enjoy it."

card.name: Noosegraf Mob
card.property: Noosegraf Mob enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell, remove a +1/+1 counter from Noosegraf Mob. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Oath of Liliana
card.property: When Oath of Liliana enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature. At the beginning of each end step, if a planeswalker entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Olivia's Dragoon
card.property: Discard a card: Olivia's Dragoon gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Displays of Voldaren bloodlust are not restricted to glamorous banquets and lavish parties.

card.name: Prying Questions
card.property: Target opponent loses 3 life and puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What remained of the Lunarch Inquisition found new ways to extract confessions.

card.name: Rise from the Grave
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't get too comfortable in there." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Ruthless Disposal
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card and sacrifice a creature. Two target creatures each get -13/-13 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do try to pull your weight, Geralf. I feel like I'm doing everything." —Ghoulcaller Gisa

card.name: Skirsdag Supplicant
card.property: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can no longer stand by as these Skirsdag infiltrators rot the church from within. Even the Lunarch Council is compromised. What a fool I've been." —Odric

card.name: Strange Augmentation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Delirium — Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Stromkirk Condemned
card.property: Discard a card: Vampires you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood from the vein is the finest vintage to accompany a feast of the mind." —Runo Stromkirk

card.name: Succumb to Temptation
card.property: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Thraben Foulbloods
card.property: Delirium — Thraben Foulbloods gets +1/+1 and has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The famed hunting hounds of House Cecani continue to prove the quality of their pedigree.

card.name: Tree of Perdition
card.property: Defender {T}: Exchange target opponent's life total with Tree of Perdition's toughness.

card.name: Vampire Cutthroat
card.property: Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Voldaren Pariah
card.property: Flying Sacrifice three other creatures: Transform Voldaren Pariah. Madness {B}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

alternate.name: Abolisher of Bloodlines
alternate.property: Flying When this creature transforms into Abolisher of Bloodlines, target opponent sacrifices three creatures.

card.name: Wailing Ghoul
card.property: When Wailing Ghoul enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, sweet brother. Help is on the way." —Ghoulcaller Gisa

card.name: Weirded Vampire
card.property: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Emrakul makes apparent those whom she has favored." —Runo Stromkirk

card.name: Whispers of Emrakul
card.property: Target opponent discards a card at random. Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, that player discards two cards at random instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your thoughts are no longer your own.

card.name: Abandon Reason
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Alchemist's Greeting
card.property: Alchemist's Greeting deals 4 damage to target creature. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Assembled Alphas
card.property: Whenever Assembled Alphas blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Assembled Alphas deals 3 damage to that creature and 3 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a toll to pay for passage.

card.name: Bedlam Reveler
card.property: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Bedlam Reveler enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

card.name: Blood Mist
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some claim that rage is a cloud that obscures thought and vision. But I can assure you—I've never seen with greater clarity."

card.name: Bold Impaler
card.property: {2} {R}: Bold Impaler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burning with hatred for Nahiri, the Voldaren and Markov forces assaulted the warped Markov Manor with a collective fury not seen in centuries.

card.name: Borrowed Hostility
card.property: Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or both — • Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. • Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Brazen Wolves
card.property: Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.

card.name: Collective Defiance
card.property: Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more — • Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards. • Collective Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. • Collective Defiance deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

card.name: Conduit of Storms
card.property: Whenever Conduit of Storms attacks, add {R} at the beginning of your next main phase this turn. {3}{R}{R}: Transform Conduit of Storms.

alternate.name: Conduit of Emrakul
alternate.property: Whenever Conduit of Emrakul attacks, add {C}{C} at the beginning of your next main phase this turn.

card.name: Deranged Whelp
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you confront a wolf scorned by its pack, extra caution is the order of the day." —Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig

card.name: Distemper of the Blood
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each day there are new reports of homes along Getander Pass and Hofsaddel falling to vampires of a more savage nature. I've even heard tell that Anje Falkenrath has returned. Please send whatever help you can." —Sterin Gorn, letter to Thalia

card.name: Furyblade Vampire
card.property: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, Furyblade Vampire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Writhe all you want, filth. It will do you no good."

card.name: Galvanic Bombardment
card.property: Galvanic Bombardment deals X damage to target creature, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Galvanic Bombardment in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Geist-powered devices have no shortage of fuel.

card.name: Hanweir Garrison
card.property: Whenever Hanweir Garrison attacks, create two 1/1 red Human creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. (Melds with Hanweir Battlements.)

alternate.name: Hanweir, the Writhing Township
alternate.property: Trample, haste Whenever Hanweir, the Writhing Township attacks, create two 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

card.name: Harmless Offering
card.property: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

card.name: Impetuous Devils
card.property: Trample, haste When Impetuous Devils attacks, up to one target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Impetuous Devils.

card.name: Incendiary Flow
card.property: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's your plan?" Gideon asked. "Are you serious?" Chandra replied.

card.name: Insatiable Gorgers
card.property: Insatiable Gorgers attacks each combat if able. Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drink deeply, for there is no tomorrow!" —Anje Falkenrath

card.name: Make Mischief
card.property: Make Mischief deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. It has "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A tidy desk is as good as an invitation.

card.name: Mirrorwing Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Mirrorwing Dragon, that player copies that spell for each other creature they control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

card.name: Nahiri's Wrath
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Nahiri's Wrath deals damage equal to the total converted mana cost of the discarded cards to each of up to X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

card.name: Otherworldly Outburst
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A tiny crack is enough to open the mind to Emrakul.

card.name: Prophetic Ravings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep your herons and shrews! You will find nothing in the moon, for the moon is a lie! It has told me so!"

card.name: Savage Alliance
card.property: Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more — • Creatures target player controls gain trample until end of turn. • Savage Alliance deals 2 damage to target creature. • Savage Alliance deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Shreds of Sanity
card.property: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card. Exile Shreds of Sanity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A few gnawing thoughts can eat at the mind until nothing else remains.

card.name: Smoldering Werewolf
card.property: When Smoldering Werewolf enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. {4}{R}{R}: Transform Smoldering Werewolf.

alternate.name: Erupting Dreadwolf
alternate.property: Whenever Erupting Dreadwolf attacks, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Spreading Flames
card.property: Spreading Flames deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hang on. I'm just tidying up." —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Stensia Banquet
card.property: Stensia Banquet deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of Vampires you control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can't win a war on an empty stomach, can we?" —Olivia Voldaren

card.name: Stensia Innkeeper
card.property: When Stensia Innkeeper enters the battlefield, tap target land an opponent controls. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The perils of the road, you say? Don't worry. You won't have to face those again."

card.name: Stromkirk Occultist
card.property: Trample Whenever Stromkirk Occultist deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Thermo-Alchemist
card.property: Defender {T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

card.name: Vildin-Pack Outcast
card.property: Trample {R}: Vildin-Pack Outcast gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {5}{R}{R}: Transform Vildin-Pack Outcast.

alternate.name: Dronepack Kindred
alternate.property: Trample {1}: Dronepack Kindred gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Weaver of Lightning
card.property: Reach Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Weaver of Lightning deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lightning in a bottle? That's not where I need it."

card.name: Backwoods Survivalists
card.property: Delirium — Backwoods Survivalists gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Paranoia has driven some Kessig communities to hunt down anything—and anyone—that travels through their woods.

card.name: Bloodbriar
card.property: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is a sourness here that I don't understand. When the land reaches out to me, I hesitate to reach back." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Clear Shot
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What worked to bring down angels will do the same for these horrors." —Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi

card.name: Crop Sigil
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put the top card of your library into your graveyard. Delirium — {2}{G}, Sacrifice Crop Sigil: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Crossroads Consecrator
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target attacking Human gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the steel of your blade match the steel in your soul."

card.name: Eldritch Evolution
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

card.name: Emrakul's Evangel
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Emrakul's Evangel and any number of other non-Eldrazi creatures: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In times like these, be particularly wary of those who claim they can save your soul."—Alena, trapper of Kessig

card.name: Emrakul's Influence
card.property: Whenever you cast an Eldrazi creature spell with converted mana cost 7 or greater, draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hordes of Eldrazi and cultists swarmed over Thraben's defenses, and the members of the Gatewatch found themselves overrun.

card.name: Foul Emissary
card.property: When Foul Emissary enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When you sacrifice Foul Emissary while casting a spell with emerge, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

card.name: Gnarlwood Dryad
card.property: Deathtouch Delirium — Gnarlwood Dryad gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Emrakul's influence radiated across Innistrad, evacuation from Kessig's remote villages became increasingly difficult.

card.name: Grapple with the Past
card.property: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Emrakul does not grant wishes. Desires simply align to her will.

card.name: Hamlet Captain
card.property: Whenever Hamlet Captain attacks or blocks, other Humans you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bloodsuckers, howlers, monsters from the beyond . . . it doesn't much matter. I won't have to face them alone."

card.name: Ishkanah, Grafwidow
card.property: Reach Delirium — When Ishkanah, Grafwidow enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, create three 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach. {6}{B}: Target opponent loses 1 life for each Spider you control.

card.name: Kessig Prowler
card.property: {4} {G}: Transform Kessig Prowler.

alternate.name: Sinuous Predator
alternate.property: Sinuous Predator can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Noose Constrictor
card.property: Reach Discard a card: Noose Constrictor gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More rope may not be necessary." —Kep, Lunarch inquisitor

card.name: Permeating Mass
card.property: Whenever Permeating Mass deals combat damage to a creature, that creature becomes a copy of Permeating Mass.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Woodland geists concluded that Emrakul would be unable to warp the denizens of the forest if the geists got there first.

card.name: Prey Upon
card.property: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Somberwald has become a hunting ground for the Dronepack, the group of werewolves that have succumbed to the flesh-twisting power of Emrakul.

card.name: Primal Druid
card.property: When Primal Druid dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The power of the woods is only ever borrowed."

card.name: Shrill Howler
card.property: Creatures with power less than Shrill Howler's power can't block it. {5}{G}: Transform Shrill Howler.

alternate.name: Howling Chorus
alternate.property: Creatures with power less than Howling Chorus's power can't block it. Whenever Howling Chorus deals combat damage to a player, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

card.name: Somberwald Stag
card.property: When Somberwald Stag enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite the reemergence of werewolves and the proliferation of Eldrazi, elk numbers in the Somberwald have remained steady.

card.name: Spirit of the Hunt
card.property: Flash When Spirit of the Hunt enters the battlefield, each other creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bonds of the pack transcend time and death.

card.name: Splendid Reclamation
card.property: Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how much a plane has suffered, there is a way to restore it." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Springsage Ritual
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every evil destroyed is a strike against the enemy." —Erold, Gatstaf springsage

card.name: Swift Spinner
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its web is woven so tightly that not even geists can avoid capture.

card.name: Tangleclaw Werewolf
card.property: Tangleclaw Werewolf can block an additional creature each combat. {6}{G}: Transform Tangleclaw Werewolf.

alternate.name: Fibrous Entangler
alternate.property: Vigilance Fibrous Entangler must be blocked if able. Fibrous Entangler can block an additional creature each combat.

card.name: Ulvenwald Captive
card.property: Defender {T}: Add {G}. {5}{G}{G}: Transform Ulvenwald Captive.

alternate.name: Ulvenwald Abomination
alternate.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Ulvenwald Observer
card.property: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I tell you, the trees were closing in! It's by the grace of the Heron alone that I made it out of the Ulvenwald!" —Ricton, traveling merchant

card.name: Waxing Moon
card.property: Transform up to one target Werewolf you control. Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show them what it means to be the source of nightmares!" —Ulrich, Krallenhorde alpha

card.name: Wolfkin Bond
card.property: Enchant creature When Wolfkin Bond enters the battlefield, Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Woodcutter's Grit
card.property: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magic used by Kessigers is known for its practical applications.

card.name: Woodland Patrol
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each had seen friends and family taken by the corruption, so each carried an axe at the other's request.

card.name: Bloodhall Priest
card.property: Whenever Bloodhall Priest enters the battlefield or attacks, if you have no cards in hand, Bloodhall Priest deals 2 damage to any target. Madness {1}{B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Campaign of Vengeance
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no saving this world, not anymore. But we shall be its bloody vengeance." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Gisa and Geralf
card.property: When Gisa and Geralf enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. During each of your turns, you may cast a Zombie creature card from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These fiends are slightly less tolerable than you." "A sentiment that warms my heart, sister."

card.name: Grim Flayer
card.property: Trample Whenever Grim Flayer deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order. Delirium — Grim Flayer gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Heron's Grace Champion
card.property: Flash Lifelink When Heron's Grace Champion enters the battlefield, other Humans you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sigarda was the last uncorrupted archangel, but she would not have to fight alone.

card.name: Mercurial Geists
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Mercurial Geists gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Procedural misstep: provocation of geists for the purpose of yielding more energy can compromise containment units. Next action: clean up mess." —Laboratory notes

card.name: Mournwillow
card.property: Haste Delirium — When Mournwillow enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, creatures with power 2 or less can't block this turn.

card.name: Ride Down
card.property: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Order of Saint Traft cleared the roads of cultists and horrors, opening the way for the villagers to flee Thraben.

card.name: Spell Queller
card.property: Flash Flying When Spell Queller enters the battlefield, exile target spell with converted mana cost 4 or less. When Spell Queller leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Tamiyo, Field Researcher
card.property: +1: Choose up to two target creatures. Until your next turn, whenever either of those creatures deals combat damage, you draw a card. −2: Tap up to two target nonland permanents. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step. −7: Draw three cards. You get an emblem with "You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs."

card.name: Ulrich of the Krallenhorde
card.property: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Ulrich of the Krallenhorde, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulrich of the Krallenhorde.

alternate.name: Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha
alternate.property: Whenever this creature transforms into Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha, you may have it fight target non-Werewolf creature you don't control. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha.

card.name: Cathar's Shield
card.property: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A leader can inspire courage, but it is the smiths and healers who truly keep hope alive." —Thalia, heretic cathar

card.name: Cryptolith Fragment
card.property: Cryptolith Fragment enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Each player loses 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if each player has 10 or less life, transform Cryptolith Fragment.

alternate.name: Aurora of Emrakul
alternate.property: Flying, deathtouch Whenever Aurora of Emrakul attacks, each opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: Cultist's Staff
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The head of the staff doubles as a brand to anoint the newly inducted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.

card.name: Geist-Fueled Scarecrow
card.property: Creature spells you cast cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It'll keep the crows away. Works on neighbors too." —Old Rutstein

card.name: Lupine Prototype
card.property: Lupine Prototype can't attack or block unless a player has no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ludevic saw it in a dream and set to work immediately, every detail already known. Can such genius be taught?" —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Slayer's Cleaver
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+1 and must be blocked by an Eldrazi if able. Equip {4}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't stop chopping until the pieces stop wiggling." —Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi

card.name: Soul Separator
card.property: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul Separator: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. Create a black Zombie creature token with power equal to that card's power and toughness equal to that card's toughness.

card.name: Stitcher's Graft
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Whenever equipped creature attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Whenever Stitcher's Graft becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent. Equip {2}

card.name: Terrarion
card.property: Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors. When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Thirsting Axe

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the weapon wields the bearer.

card.name: Geier Reach Sanitarium
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.

card.name: Hanweir Battlements
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {R}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {3}{R}{R}, {T}: If you both own and control Hanweir Battlements and a creature named Hanweir Garrison, exile them, then meld them into Hanweir, the Writhing Township.

alternate.name: Hanweir, the Writhing Township
alternate.property: Trample, haste Whenever Hanweir, the Writhing Township attacks, create two 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

card.name: Nephalia Academy
card.property: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard a card, you may reveal that card and put it on top of your library instead of putting it anywhere else. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May knowledge be our sanctuary." —Yora, academy researcher
